text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose
of daily new English phrases and words
brought to you by let's store
podcast.com
[Music]
hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 117 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
plummets let's find out what it means
and how you can use it in your daily
conversation flummox at times you are
left speechless or puzzled and are
unable to react to something the word
flummox basically means to confuse
someone or to get confused by something
sometimes you are put in a situation
that you never expected to be in you
actually feel so confused that you don't
know how to react it at that moment it
means you are flummoxed if you are
flummoxed by something you are confused
by it and don't know what to say as you
can't think clearly for example a
student may not be able to solve a math
equation as he's confused and has no
idea how to go about doing it it means
he is flummoxed the word flummox is a
verb in the present form and the word
flummoxed is the past and past
participle form of the verb okay now
that you know what flummox means let's
take a look at some example sentences
and see how you can use it in your daily
conversation example 1 on her way to the
new city Linda used the road map to find
her way through when she was flummoxed
example two while reading the
instructions on his new washing machine
Richard was flummoxed example 3 the last
question in the exam flummoxed Victor
example 4 Henry was flummoxed about the
cooking method that his wife had taught
him example 5 the variety of breads at
the bakery store flummoxes melissa as
she doesn't know which one to buy
example 6 kelly helped her grandmother
with her new android phone so she
doesn't get flummoxed while using it
example 7 being a champion in playing
chess mr. Williams never gets flummoxed
during the game example 8 while talking
to his customer
Andy was flummoxed as he couldn't find
his details on his laptop example 9 the
Accounts Department was flummoxed while
working on the past five years financial
statements of the company
that's the end of today's episode when
was the last time you were flummoxed and
why kindly share your experiences in the
comment box below this video thank you
for watching us do watch all the
episodes of daily video vocabulary to
better your English language skills do
subscribe to our Channel and stay
updated with all the latest lessons I
will see you again tomorrow with a new
word or a phrase till then bye and take
care
[Music]
